source_sentence: 金色童子因緣經卷第三
translation: Sutra on the Causes and Conditions of the Golden-colored Boy, Volume 3

source_sentence: 譯經三藏朝散大夫試鴻
translation: translated sūtras of the Tripiṭaka朝散大夫試鴻

source_sentence: 臚卿光梵大師賜紫沙門
translation: Guangfan Daishi, the founder of the order, bestowed a purple ascetic title upon him.

source_sentence: 臣惟淨等奉　詔譯
translation: a translation by imperial edict of the ministers, such as Vaiśravaṇa

source_sentence: 爾時，諸巡警官相與議言：「眾所共觀，今此童子儀相調善，諒其不能發斯重業，
translation: At that time, the constables and guards conferred with each other, saying: Everyone is observing together. Now this boy has a well-maintained demeanor. We understand that he cannot commit such serious crimes.

source_sentence: 又復于今無餘異狀，我等隨處遇斯艱苦，今者云何理行其事？」
translation: Again, there are no other distinctive characteristics here, so wherever we've encountered this kind of difficulty and suffering, how can we now conduct ourselves accordingly?

source_sentence: 中一人言：「此事狀者，誠非我等所能參議，國有刑司大臣掌法，今宜監領童子、女人詣彼詳辯。」
translation: The one among them said, This is really not something we can discuss; there's a minister of justice in the state who commands the Dharma, and now it's appropriate to supervise the children and women to go to him for detailed explanation.

source_sentence: 眾議定已，舉彼女人臥置竹輿，執持童子俱詣法司。
translation: After the assembly had been settled, the woman was taken to bed and placed on a bamboo carriage. Carrying the boy in her arms, she went to the treasury of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 爾時，勇戾大臣職當掌法，與諸法官共會一處。
translation: At the time, the minister of courage and wickedness, who was in charge of the Dharma, met with the judges in one place.

source_sentence: 遙見彼諸巡警官來漸至其前，即發問言：「汝等諸官斯來何為？
translation: From a distance, he saw the sheriff officials coming and gradually approaching him. He asked, What are you officials doing here?

source_sentence: 有何事耶？」
translation: What's the matter?

source_sentence: 諸官答言：「今此女人於日照商主園中，不知何人殺害其命，我等審諦于三伺察，
translation: The officials replied, “This woman is now in the park of the merchant lord Illumination. I do not know who killed her life.

source_sentence: 於其園內唯見金色童子，餘無事狀，我等即時詢童子言：『今此女人誰致殺耶？』
translation: In that park, we saw only a golden-colored boy with no other characteristics, and we immediately asked the boy, 'Who killed this woman now?'

source_sentence: 童子答言：『諸官明察，我於是事雖覩其狀，而實不知何人所殺。』
translation: The boy answered, 'The officials clearly observe that even though I've seen their appearance in this matter, I really don't know who killed them.'

source_sentence: 我等今時監領至此，願賜明辯。」
translation: Now that we're here to supervise them, may we be given insight and eloquence?

source_sentence: 時大臣言：「汝等小待須臾，俟當審察。」
translation: The minister then said, All of you, wait a moment for me to examine it.

source_sentence: 後詣王所求從理斷。
translation: Later, he went to the king's place and asked him to stop following the principle.

source_sentence: 是時，掌法大臣即詣阿闍世王宮，見守門者監護王門，即前問言：「王止何處，
translation: The minister of the Dharma then went to the palace of King Ajātaśatru. Seeing the gatekeeper guarding the king’s door, he came forward and asked, “Where is your majesty staying?

source_sentence: 復何所作？」
translation: What else will it do?

source_sentence: 守門者言：「王今登殿，召諸宮女鼓吹歌音方當娛樂。」
translation: The gatekeeper said, Now that the king has ascended to the palace, he summoned the palace ladies to play on the drums and sing in order to entertain him.

source_sentence: 是時，大臣即於宮門求掌執者，托以其事陳奏于王：「今有日照商主之子，
translation: At that moment, the minister asked for someone to hold the palm of his hand at the palace gate. He presented this matter to the king and said:

source_sentence: 於自園中殺害迦尸孫那利妓女，若今不受王者詔命，我等諸臣莫能宰判。」
translation: If he kills the Kāśi Sunnali prostitute in his own garden and doesn't accept the king's order now, we ministers won't be able to judge him.

source_sentence: 是時，掌執宮嬪速詣王所具陳上事，王正娛樂未暇審詳，乃勅宮嬪：「汝往語彼勇戾大臣，
translation: At that moment, the prince in charge of the palace quickly went to the king and told him all the above matters. The king was so amused that he did not have time to investigate them thoroughly. So he instructed his courtier, “Go tell this brave minister who is holding sway over the king’s affairs:

source_sentence: 宜當審細如實詳察。」
translation: It's advisable to examine it in detail and investigate it exactly as it is.

source_sentence: 女使受命出宣王勅，令勇戾大臣等諸法官審明其事。
translation: The woman's envoy was instructed to go out and proclaim the king's command, causing the courageous ministers and other judges to examine their affairs.

source_sentence: 遍宣示已，時勇戾大臣還復法司，謂諸巡警官言：「汝可往召膾宰之人，
translation: After he had made this announcement, the brave minister returned to the treasury councilor of the Dharma and said to the officers in charge of the constancy, “You may go and summon the executioner.

source_sentence: 令速至此。」
translation: I'll quickly reach this place.

source_sentence: 到已，謂言：「今此童子於自園中殺害迦尸孫那利妓女，汝今宜往執縛其人，
translation: On arriving there, he said, “This boy is killing the Kaśinagara maidservant in his own park.

source_sentence: 擊鼓告令四衢巷陌普使聞知，出城南門往詣棄屍林中，投以鐵叉使令命絕，
translation: They beat their drums and ordered the messengers to be informed at all crossroads of the four quarters, leaving the south gate of the city and proceeding to the cemetery for burial.

source_sentence: 然後同其死女置於柴積舉火焚之。」
translation: Then, he puts the dead woman with him in a pile of firewood and sets it on fire.

source_sentence: 是時，膾宰之人雖聞是命，覩其金色童子色相嚴好猶如金山，痛切其心互相謂曰：「汝等云何斯人可殺？
translation: At that time, even though the executioners had heard this instruction, they pityed the golden-colored boy whose appearance was as beautiful as a mountain of gold. They felt pain in their hearts and said to each other, “How can you kill him?

source_sentence: 今此童子人中難得容止可觀，我等雖預膾宰亦有悲心，如斯輩人豈忍害耶？
translation: Now, it's difficult for this boy to be disciplined and observed among people, but even though we were previously disciplined, we also had compassion, so how could such a group of people tolerate harm?

source_sentence: 寧使我等自壞其命，終不於斯敢行刑戮。」
translation: Let's rather let our lives be destroyed by ourselves, and we won't dare to commit killing here.

source_sentence: 是時，勇戾大臣聞膾宰人議已，復作怒言：「汝等何故稽延時久？
translation: Having heard the king's ruler's advice, the minister of courageousness and wickedness then again became angry, saying, Why have you been here so long?

source_sentence: 而不速疾從其命耶？」
translation: Wouldn't you quickly follow their orders?

source_sentence: 時膾宰人合掌趨前，咸哀告言：「大臣王者！
translation: The executioners then joined their palms and went forward, and they all grieved and told him, Minister king!

source_sentence: 願今止息，我等雖預膾宰之人，而亦不能勇行其事。
translation: I entreat you to stop now! Although we foresaw the executioners, we will not be able to carry out their deeds.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is it so?

source_sentence: 今此童子色相端嚴人所愛念，如何今時忍致殺耶？」
translation: Now that this boy's appearance is so dignified and beloved by people, how can he tolerate killing at the present time?

source_sentence: 大臣聞已，轉復瞋恚，告彼人言：「汝等若不從王命者，定於今日汝等所有妻子、眷屬悉同其死。」
translation: After hearing this, the minister became angry and told those people, If you don't obey the king's order, surely today all of your wives and dependents will die together.

source_sentence: 諸膾宰人聞是言已，咸生驚怖，復相謂言：「今此何故，掌法大臣不依正法如理而行？
translation: Having heard these words, the king's officials were all terrified and said to each other, Why isn't the minister of the Dharma in charge acting according to the right teaching and following the right principles?

source_sentence: 此童子者，色相嚴好人中難得，堅令棄置使害其命，復謂我等若不殺者妻子眷屬悉同其死。
translation: This boy, who is rarely found among people with beautiful features and forms, insists on abandoning him so that his life will be harmed. Again, he says, 'If we don't kill him, our wives, children, and retinues will all die the same way.'

source_sentence: 何故我等受斯艱苦？
translation: Why are we suffering this kind of distress?

source_sentence: 我等今時云何所行？」
translation: What are we doing now?

source_sentence: 是時，諸膾宰人死怖所逼，即生計智：「今此童子眾所愛念，宜應引詣四衢巷陌多人聚處，
translation: At that time the king’s servants, overcome with fear of death, thought to themselves, “This prince should now be driven to a place where there are many people living together on the street corners in the four directions.

source_sentence: 眾觀其事。
translation: The crowd observed these things.

source_sentence: 而是童子旋踵之間，彼多人眾應起悲念，不忍觀矚，必為設其方計救護。」
translation: Rather, the boy circled between his heels, and those many people should give rise to compassionate thoughts that can't be tolerated or observed, for which they must set up a plan to save and protect them.

source_sentence: 其後諸膾宰人身心逼迫，如切如割，皆悉涕淚，咸作是言：「苦哉！
translation: After that, the executioners were physically and mentally oppressed, as if they were cutting or cutting their bodies, all weeping and crying, saying, That's painful!

source_sentence: 我等作何罪業，如是逼切，使我成辦無義利事？」
translation: What sins have we done that are thus suppressed and made to accomplish useless things for us?

source_sentence: 爾時，勇戾大臣後極增恚，謂膾宰言：「汝等何故加復延久？」
translation: At that point, the bold minister became very angry and said to the executioner, Why are you prolonging it so long?

source_sentence: 諸膾宰人聞是語已，而悉涕泣勉抑而為，乃詣童子執取其衣繫縛雙臂。
translation: Having heard these words, the king's officials wept and compelled them to do so, and they went to the boy to take his robe and tie it around his arm.

source_sentence: 彼繫縛已，勇戾大臣具觀其事，即時驅離掌法之司，往詣棄屍林中。
translation: After they were bound, the minister Courageous and impetuous observed their affairs. Immediately he expelled the official in charge of the Dharma and went to the corpse-abandonment grove.

source_sentence: 時諸人眾觀者，皆生別離忿恚而悉墮淚，咸作是言：「苦哉！
translation: The people who observed it then all became separated from their anger and wept, and they all said, That's painful!

source_sentence: 危逼！
translation: It's dangerous!

source_sentence: 今此童子人中難得，即期殞謝。」
translation: Now, this boy is difficult to find among people, so he'll surely die.

source_sentence: 諸膾宰人監執童子，周行巷陌時中容緩慮其可救，又復引詣闤闠之所。
translation: The king's officials and ministers supervised the boy, who was walking around the alleyway at the time when he was about to be rescued, and they again led him to the inn.

source_sentence: 是時，王舍城中內外所居男女大小，及餘方處所來人眾，而悉會聚，共觀金色童子執縛其臂。
translation: At the time, the men and women living inside and outside the city of Rājagṛha, as well as people large and small and those coming from other places, all gathered together to see the golden-colored boy holding his arm.

source_sentence: 見已，咸生苦切悲念，荒惑其心，俱發問言：「此人何故如是執縛？」
translation: Seeing this, they all became pained and saddened, and their minds were disturbed, and they all asked, Why is this person thus bound?

source_sentence: 時諸膾宰哽咽悲泣，答眾人言：「或謂此童子殺害迦尸孫那利女，故此執持將欲棄置，
translation: The butchers and executioners then sobbed in sorrow and cried out in distress. They replied to the crowd, “Either you say that this boy killed the daughter of Kāśinagara or that he intended to throw away his retainer.

source_sentence: 遍一切處眾所共聞，今詣棄屍林中，而後非久即當殞謝。」
translation: They've been heard by everyone everywhere, and now they'll go to abandon the corpse in the forest, but it won't be long before he dies.

source_sentence: 眾人聞已，咸生悲苦，異口同音唱如是言：「苦哉！
translation: When the crowd heard this, they all became saddened and cried out in unison, saying, That's painful!

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 一何危逼？
translation: What's the first danger of being oppressed?

source_sentence: 而此童子色相端嚴眾所樂見，身支圓具有金色光，悅目適心眾共瞻覩。
translation: The boy’s complexion was dignified and pleasing to the eye. All people liked to see him; his limbs of body were well rounded, golden-colored, and he delighted in seeing with eyes that looked agreeable to them.

source_sentence: 儀相調寂智慧明利，悲心具足愛念眾生，常起法欲具大威德，如是之人豈可殺耶？
translation: Their manner is peaceful, their wisdom and insight are bright and sharp, their compassionate minds are filled with love for sentient beings, and they always give rise to the desire for the Dharma and possess great authority. How could a person like this be killed?

source_sentence: 賢聖彰明今何隱沒？
translation: Good men and sages manifest their insight, so why are they now hidden?

source_sentence: 覆蔽正法非法熾然，王者統臨現居尊極，一何如是枉橫逼人？」
translation: What's so unwholesome and unlawful that it obstructs the right teaching and blazes out like a king who governs and lives at the supreme level, and what's so unwholesome and unjust as this?

source_sentence: 「色相謙恭復尊貴，　　最上增勝所莊嚴，
translation: Their forms are humble and respectful, yet noble, Adorned by the supreme adornment.

source_sentence: 我等如是觀復觀，　　殊妙愛樂昔未有。
translation: We observe and further observe in this way: Such marvelous pleasures as these have never been seen before.

source_sentence: 我等皆見此童子，　　今為膾宰所執持，
translation: We all saw this boy, and now we're being held by the executioner.

source_sentence: 最極悲苦眾咸生，　　破壞摧毀諸身意，
translation: The most extreme compassionate and painful beings all arise, Disfiguring their bodies and minds.

source_sentence: 能開多人悅意目，　　復為多人所愛樂，
translation: They can open the eyes of many with joy, And they are liked by many.

source_sentence: 云何於此妙身中，　　王者嚴刑可能及？
translation: How could the king be punished in this marvelous body?

source_sentence: 大眾若常觀矚時，　　彼欣樂心皆無足，
translation: If the masses always observe and contemplate, Their joy and happiness will be boundless.

source_sentence: 云何棄已付法人？　　苦哉臣輔無悲愍。
translation: How is it that you have abandoned the body entrusted to me?

source_sentence: 口中常說諸法律，　　隨其所說善能行，
translation: Always explaining the teachings in words, They can practice according to what they teach.

source_sentence: 審觀如是調善人，　　何能起發斯罪業？
translation: How can such a well-adjusted person who examines and observes how to give rise to this kind of sinful activity?

source_sentence: 此即乃行於非法，　　正法隱沒或滅亡，
translation: This is to say that they practice what’s unlawful, and the right teaching may be concealed or cease.

source_sentence: 若今運用此功能，　　我等咸生離散苦。」
translation: If we now use this function, we'll all experience the pain of separation.

source_sentence: 是時，人眾說伽陀曰：時諸人眾說伽陀已。
translation: At the time, the multitude of people spoke the verse, saying, After the multitude of people spoke the verse, he said.

source_sentence: 城中復有諸女人眾，於此童子極生愛念，是中或有一類女人，以別離苦所逼惱，
translation: Again, there were women in the city who had great affection for this boy. Some of these women separated themselves from him by avoiding suffering and oppressing him.

source_sentence: 故宛轉于地，或有女人拊膝傷痛，或有女人心識癡迷，一一皆如離散親子受大苦惱。
translation: That's why it just turns to the ground, whether there's a woman with crude knees and pain or a woman with deluded thoughts and consciousnesses, each one of them like a separate father and mother who experience great suffering and distress.

source_sentence: 是時，王舍城中內外所有一切人眾，以此童子將期命殞，咸生別離逼切之苦，
translation: At the time, all the people inside and outside the city of Rājagṛha were staring at this boy as he was about to die, suffering from separation and oppression.

source_sentence: 互相叫唱聲言雜亂，戰怖慞惶，悲苦無救。
translation: They screamed to each other and cried out in distress, saying, “How can we be saved? We are terrified.

source_sentence: 時日照商主舍中有一童女，因適衢市竊聞其事，即時悲泣速還自舍，詣金色童子母所。
translation: At the time, there was a young woman in the house of the merchant lord Sun Shining who happened to go to the marketplace to hear about it. So she wept and quickly returned from her home and went to the mother of the golden boy.

source_sentence: 到已，趨前舉身投地，是時金色童子之母疑惑迷亂，即發問言：「汝有何事，
translation: When he arrived, the golden-colored boy’s mother was doubtful and confused. She asked him, “What are you doing?

source_sentence: 宜今速說？」
translation: Is it appropriate to speak quickly now?

source_sentence: 童女白言：「尊母當知，金色童子執縛其臂膾宰監逐，眾皆謂言：『於自園中殺彼迦尸孫那利女，
translation: The young woman said, “You should know that the golden-colored boy is bound by his arm.

source_sentence: 非久即詣棄屍林中，命將殞謝。』
translation: Not long after that, he went to the abandoned corpse's forest and died.'

source_sentence: 四衢巷陌一切人眾，咸悉聞知。」
translation: All the people in the four streets and lanes know it.

source_sentence: 時童子母聞是語已，憂苦極深悶絕躃地，以水灑面，良久乃蘇，從地而起，
translation: When the prince’s mother heard these words, she was greatly distressed and faint-stricken. She covered her face with water and came back to life after a long time.

source_sentence: 唱如是言：「苦哉！
translation: They called out in this way, saying, That's painful!

source_sentence: 我子！
translation: I, my child!

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 我子！」
translation: I, my child!

source_sentence: 即時戰怖驚惶失次，拊膝軫悲頭髮蓬亂，自舍而出奔，詣四衢及諸巷陌，
translation: Immediately they fled in fear of the enemy and were terrified. They knelt on their knees, cried out in distress, and their hair stood on end in distress. They ran away from their dwelling place and ran off to the four quarters and all the other streets.

source_sentence: 以子別離憂苦所逼，力劣心疲舉聲叫唱，凡所見者皆發問言：「我子金色童子今何所在？
translation: Because the child was separated from being tormented by sorrow and suffering, weak and exhausted, he screamed and cried. Everyone who saw him asked, Where is my golden-colored boy now?

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 今時不見我子。
translation: At the present time, they don't see my child.

source_sentence: 汝諸仁者，願賜救護！
translation: Gentlemen, may you be granted protection!

source_sentence: 願賜救護！
translation: May you be granted protection!

source_sentence: 令我于今得見其子。」
translation: So that I can see my son now.

source_sentence: 如是悲泣，周遍街巷隨處而住。
translation: Thus, weeping in sorrow, they pervaded the streets and lanes and lived wherever they were.

source_sentence: 是時日照商主之妻，以不見其金色童子，最極憂苦所逼切故，周行迷亂高聲叫唱，
translation: At that time the sun shone over the merchant’s wife but she did not see her golden-colored boy. Because he was driven by extreme sorrow and suffering, she wandered everywhere in confusion, screaming loudly.

source_sentence: 凡所見者而悉禮奉合掌告言：「願速救護！
translation: Everyone who saw him saluted him with joined palms and said, May you quickly rescue him!

source_sentence: 願速救護！
translation: May you quickly rescue him!

source_sentence: 乃至我子未到林所，其中容受令我得見。」
translation: Even when my son hasn't yet arrived at the forest, he allows me to see it.

source_sentence: 又復告言：「汝應悲念為令我子未至破壞，使我得見。」
translation: Again, he told them, You should be compassionate and make sure that my son doesn't reach destruction so that I can see it.

source_sentence: 時童子母發苦切言，告諸人已，未見子間，又復唱言：「苦哉！
translation: The boy's mother then became distressed and told the people, but when she didn't see him among them, she again said, That's painful!

source_sentence: 云何不見我子？」
translation: How can you not see my child?

source_sentence: 是時舉身自投于地，盤桓宛轉地中跳躑，如魚出水在枯涸地，踧踖周慞不遑安處，
translation: He then raised his body and threw himself to the ground. Pan Huannan climbed up and down onto the ground, like a fish that emerges from water in a dried-up place with its wings extending all over it but not letting it rest.

source_sentence: 心如割切悲復增悲，猶如新生犢子失其牛母，多種驚惶，危逼唱言：「苦哉！
translation: The mind is like a newly born calf that loses its cow's mother, and many people are frightened and cried in fear, saying, That's painful!

source_sentence: 我之子！
translation: My child!

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 意所樂。
translation: What's pleasing to the mind...

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 善忍者！
translation: Good ninja!

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 大孝人！
translation: Great filial piety!

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 多願求所獲之愛子！
translation: Many wish to seek what's obtained, beloved child!

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 妙相人所樂觀。
translation: The marvelous characteristic is the contemplation that people delight in.

source_sentence: 苦哉！
translation: How painful!

source_sentence: 身支圓滿具足。

translation: My son will be abandoned in the forest of corpses; You should now wish to rescue him.
